AddOnStorageValue.Name: wpForo Forum_Unauthenticated Reflected Cross-Site Scripting
AddOnStorageValue.Value: { "Id": "4f74f650-301c-4e50-a7c6-785131388ef3", "Application": "wpForo Forum", "AffectedVersions": [ "<=1.4.11" ], "VulnerabilityName": "Unauthenticated Reflected Cross-Site Scripting", "ExternalReferer": "CVE-2018-11709, WPVDB-ID-9090", "Impact": "Medium", "Note": "wpforo_get_request_uri in wpf-includes/functions.php in the wpForo Forum plugin before 1.4.12 for WordPress allows Unauthenticated Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) via the URI." }
